title: [BUG] Add regression tests to prevent generic positioning when customer evidence exists

sections.text: Create automated tests for the positioning generator that validate outputs include verbatim customer snippets and citations whenever evidence is available for the target segment. Add fixtures covering (a) evidence-rich segments, (b) sparse-evidence segments that must be explicitly flagged as low-evidence, and (c) mixed-source evidence to ensure correct source attribution. Fail the test suite if the generator returns uncited, generic claims in evidence-rich scenarios.
